answers.author: Cory Fleming
answers.text:
We don't have a good way measure that count, Jim, but 311 or some type of centralized customer service system can be found in 21 of the top 30 cities in population, and continues to spread to more and more mid-sized and smaller communities.  The general rule of thumb for estimating 311 call volume on an annual basis is the population size of the community give or take a few percentage points.  It depends very much the marketing and outreach efforts to put 311 before the community on a routine basis.
